name: DAEMON LIGHT CHASSIS
description:
BAPTIZED IN THE BLOOD OF RAH, THE MOTHER OF MONSTERS GIFTS US HER TAINTED BODY.
This pilot gear cannot be removed. While it has a charge, you may change it into either other Daemon Chassis as a Full Action. You may consume a mech's Core Battery as a Quick Action to empower all Daemon pilot gear for the rest of the scene.

actions.name: ENDURE - DAEMON CHASSIS
actions.detail: Spend a charge to restore 1d6 HP and remove the Down and Out condition from yourself. If empowered, this restores an additional 1d6 HP.
